subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: In his return from a one-year doping ban, Tyson Gay finished second to Justin Gatlin, who ran a year-best 9.80 seconds in the 100 meters at the Athletissima in Laussane, Switzerland.
snippet: In his return from a one-year doping ban, Tyson Gay finished second to Justin Gatlin, who ran a year-best 9.80 seconds in the 100 meters at the Athletissima in Laussane, Switzerland.
